rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lounge
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall integrated with a lounge area. Vastu principles ensure the main door is in the east to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the entrance hall. Decorated with traditional Kerala motifs and natural light from south-facing windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with Vastu-compliant placement for communal dining, ensuring a balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen integrated with compact servant quarters. Utilizes local design elements and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Garage Entrance / Car Port
rooms.description: Designated area for a two-car garage, allowing easy access to the property while aligning with local building norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Contains laundry and storage. Vastu guidelines advise placing utilities in the northwestern part of the house for stability.

openings.description: The main entrance placed on the east side to harness positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Garage door designed with ease of access and security in mind.
Large patio doors leading to the outdoor swimming pool area, ensuring an open feel and connection with nature.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with traditional Kerala style, featuring an attached ensuite bathroom and ample natural light from east-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style bedroom with natural ventilation. Incorporates local design elements.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom in the first floor, following Vastu principles by ensuring a balanced layout.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom in the upper level, designed for privacy and tranquility.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Overhanging balcony offering a private outdoor space and overlooking the swimming pool area below.

openings.description: Balcony windows ensuring ample morning light for the master bedroom.
Central staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed in keeping with Kerala aesthetics.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the second floor, following traditional design principles and Vastu guidelines for balanced energy distribution.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Final bedroom of the six-bedroom suite in a compact layout designed with local materials to maintain budget constraints.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym incorporating traditional Kerala architectural elements. Designed for comfort and functionality on the upper floor.

openings.description: Secondary staircase ensuring easy access to the second-floor gym and additional bedrooms.
